name: Mushroom Gore
description:
Mushroom Gore is an Unreal Engine 5.1 game made for the Enigma GameJam hosted by Matt Aspland.

On a apocalyptic, misty, forest road you try to find other humans. But when something unexpected happens you have to fight for your survival. The help you find also brings something SUPERNATURAL with it. Can you handle the POWER?

This is an over-the-shoulder survival shooter with some supernatural abbilities. Search your surrounding for useful things to pick up. Survive and get more powerful as you progress through the game.

You can change the resolution and graphic settings according to your computer. The graphic settings range from Low to Epic. During playtesting on a pc with an AMD Ryzen 3600, 16gb of RAM and a AMD 5700XT the framerate was between 50 and 60 FPS on 1920x1080 and HIGH graphic settings.
